Package flamesdev.neon.critical

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGame
    An interface containing a tick and render method which are necessary to make a functioning game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameSettings
    A class that stores data about the game's settings.
    InputSystem
    A class used to get user input.
    MouseInput
    A class that automatically updates the information in the InputSystem class.
    MouseInteraction
    A class that stores data about a mouse interaction.
    NeonEngine
    The the main class for the Neon Game Library.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MouseButtonType
    An enumeration containing values of mouse button types.
